frontmatter.title: watsonx
frontmatter.description: IBM Fusion makes it fast to get a resilient deployment of watsonx up and running in your data center.

internal.content:
--- title: watsonx description: IBM Fusion makes it fast to get a resilient deployment of watsonx up and running in your data center. --- IBM Fusion enables optimized Data and AI solutions and is built to provide enterprise ready deployments of IBM watsonx. Get up and running quickly with Fusion HCI Enterprise-grade resiliency for watsonx Accelerating watsonx.data queries with Fusion ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/watsonx-acceleration.jpg) ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/solution-overview.jpg) ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png) Looking to deploy watsonx on-prem? Go with a proven solution, rather than designing, proving, and maintaining a custom architecture. AI and Data workloads need performance, scalability, and resiliency. IBM Fusion provides hardware architectures that are proven with watsonx workloads, and provide high availability, backup/restore, and disaster recovery. ## Get up and running quickly with Fusion HCI IBM Fusion HCI provides a bare metal appliance that makes it easy to get up and running quickly with watsonx. The hyper-converged solution provides bare metal worker nodes, GPU nodes, and high speed switches - everything that you need to host your Data and AI platform. The automated installer deploys Red Hat OpenShift, enabling you to get up and running quickly. High performance container native storage is pre-configured for running IBM Cloud Pak for Data, further simplifying the deployment. > With IBM Fusion HCI, you can get a POC of watsonx up and running in less than a week. IBM Fusion HCI is fully tested with both OpenShift and watsonx.

Want to build your own
solution for watsonx?

Check out the [reference architecture](https://github.com/IBM/storage-fusion/blob/master/reference-architectures/fusion-sds-with-watsonx-data.md) for deploying watsonx on bare metal with storage acceleration.
![Large blocky illustration](/images/hci-appliance.jpg) ## Enterprise-grade resiliency for watsonx IBM Fusion HCI is built with resiliency in mind. The appliance features a fully redundant networking, and its container native storage protects against node or drive failures using erasure coding. The watsonx configuration is protected using built in backup and recovery capabilities, enabling you to recover your watsonx deployment to another cluster in the event of a disaster. ## Accelerating watsonx.data queries with Fusion IBM Fusion HCI doesn’t just provide a platform for running watsonx. It’s able to accelerate watsonx.data queries by providing a high speed distributed cache based on IBM’s proven technology used for High Performance Computing. As queries are run, intelligent caching quickly serves meta-data and data, cutting down on the queries going to object storage. ## Learn more ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png) ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png) ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png) ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png) ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png) ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png) ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png) ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png) ![Dark article layout mockup](/images/Article_06.png)
